wikipedia_page.main: John Frederick Rishton (born 21 February 1958) is a British business executive who served as the CEO of Rolls-Royce from March 2011 to July 2015.

link_mentions.page: List of University of Nottingham people
response: * John Rishton – CEO, Royal Ahold and Rolls-Royce

On 30 September 2010 he announced his decision to retire from Rolls-Royce and his position of Chief Executive. He left his post at the end of March 2011 with John Rishton taking over the Chief Executive position.
*John Rishton, CEO of the Dutch company Ahold

In 2014 East became a non-executive director of Rolls-Royce Holdings and chair of the board's technology committee. In April 2015 Rolls-Royce announced that East would succeed John Rishton as CEO, when Rishton retired on 2 July.
* John Rishton – former CEO of Rolls-Royce plc, R
Boer joined Ahold in 1998, rising to CEO on 1 March 2011, succeeding John Rishton.
